description:
A sorceress of the highest quality, she meets up with Yanagi and Staz after they use her gateway connecting Hell and Earth after it was stolen from her. She has expressed interest both in unsealing Staz`s powers and it hinted that she has a crush on him. A naturally outgoing and goofy person, she is rarely seen without her giant backpack.
Source: blood-lad.wikia.com
name: Hydra Bell
